report.title: Splash My Visits
report.description: Display a list of visits suitable for users to view their own data.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = csf.id JOIN locations plot ON plot.id = csf.location_id AND plot.deleted=false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lavPlotName on lavPlotName.location_attribute_id=#plot_number_attr_id# AND lavPlotName.location_id=plot.id AND lavPlotName.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms ttPlotType on ttPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id JOIN terms termPlotType on termPlotType.id = ttPlotType.term_id --JOIN sample_attribute_values savLinkToSurveyOne ON savLinkToSurveyOne.sample_id = csf.id AND savLinkToSurveyOne.sample_attribute_id = #s1AttrID# AND savLinkToSurveyOne.int_value = 0 LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savLinkToSurveyOne ON savLinkToSurveyOne.sample_id = csf.id AND savLinkToSurveyOne.sample_attribute_id = #s1AttrID# AND savLinkToSurveyOne.int_value != 0 AND savLinkToSurveyOne.deleted=false LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values savLinkToSurveyTwo on savLinkToSurveyTwo.int_value = csf.id AND savLinkToSurveyTwo.sample_attribute_id = #s1AttrID# AND savLinkToSurveyTwo.int_value != 0 AND savLinkToSurveyTwo.deleted=false WHERE #website_filter# AND csf.created_by_id=#current_user# AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR csf.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR csf.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) #order_by#

param.name: current_user
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: s1AttrID
param.description: The ID of the sample attribute that links a second sample to a first

param.name: plot_number_attr_id
param.description: Id of the location attribute that holds the plot number label

param.name: person_square_attr_id
param.description: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

column.name: location_name
column.sql: COALESCE( case when lavPlotName.text_value IS null then '' || 'Plot at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' else '' || 'Plot ' || lavPlotName.text_value || ' at ' || plot.centroid_sref || ' ('|| termPlotType.term || ') ' || '' end , csf.location_name, csnf.public_entered_sref)

column.name: show_add_sample_2
column.sql: case when savLinkToSurveyOne.id IS NULL AND savLinkToSurveyTwo.id IS NULL THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: survey_number
column.sql: 'Survey ' || case when savLinkToSurveyOne.int_value IS NOT NULL THEN '2 ' ELSE '1' END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when csf.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else csf.input_form end
